title: TRICARE
description:
TRICARE is the health care program for uniformed service members, retirees, and their families worldwide. It provides comprehensive coverage including autism-related services such as Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA), speech therapy, occupational therapy, and mental health services.

TRICARE covers autism spectrum disorder diagnosis and treatment for beneficiaries. The Extended Care Health Option (ECHO) provides additional financial assistance for qualifying dependents with autism, covering services like ABA therapy, respite care, and specialized equipment beyond standard TRICARE benefits.

For military families in Florida, TRICARE offers several plan options including TRICARE Prime, TRICARE Select, and TRICARE For Life (for Medicare-eligible retirees). Coverage for autism services may require referrals or prior authorization depending on your plan type.

Families should contact their regional TRICARE contractor or visit the TRICARE website to verify specific autism coverage details, find network providers, and understand authorization requirements for ABA and other therapies.
